CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 柔软的；柔和的；舒服的；舒适的；软弱的；松弛的；软性的；轻柔的；轻的；细腻的；柔滑的；轻松的；轻微的；和缓的；软调的；软音的；无棱角的；不坚定的；未打定主意的；有同情心的；[化]（酸、碱）易极化的；坡度徐缓的；（透镜）分辨率低的；（辐射线）穿透力软弱的；（小麦）含淀粉多而麸蛋白少的；（水）不含无机盐的；<英>下雨的；潮湿的；（币值）不稳定的；平静的；安稳的；无酒精的；细滑的；和蔼的；宽厚的；愚蠢的；低反差的
柔和地；轻柔地；温柔地；轻轻地；缓慢地；无力地；悄无声息地；愚蠢地；不严厉地；舒适地；安静地；<口>笨乎乎地；傻呆呆地
柔软（部分）；柔性；柔软的东西；<口>傻瓜；笨蛋；易耗品（如衣服、食品、药品等）；拙笨

synonym.mean: 软的，柔软的；温柔的，温和的；软弱的；笨的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有点软的；相当温柔的；相当柔和的
温柔地；柔和地；柔软地；静静地
使温和；使缓和；使变柔软

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指温柔、亲切、优雅。常含有节制和意味。
中性词，指温和稳健，有节制，不走极端。
和gentle意思很接近。指人的感情细腻、温情慈爱和有同情心，侧重心理素质。也可指物的柔嫩等。
用于人时，指天性温顺，脾气好，不放肆粗野；用于物时，主要指适度，程度上相当缓和给人以愉快感觉。
侧重柔软或安稳、光滑，使人不感到粗糙或严酷。

word_group.brief_definition: 无酒精饮料, 软性饮料
轻音乐；轻柔的音乐；柔和的音乐
对别人的要求容易答应的人
软肥皂；液皂；半液体皂；奉承；谄媚
软着陆；经济增长软着陆

bilingual.target: 棉布是一种柔软的织物。

bilingual.source: He has a soft spot for animals.
bilingual.target: 他对动物有一种柔软的情感。

bilingual.source: This fabric is a very soft material.
bilingual.target: 这块布料是一种非常柔软的物质。

bilingual.source: They use cotton to make soft towels.
bilingual.target: 他们用棉花制作柔软的毛巾。

bilingual.source: The sweater is made from soft yarns.
bilingual.target: 这件毛衣是用柔软的纱线制成的。

bilingual.source: The jacket is lined with soft fleece.
bilingual.target: 这件夹克有衬里是柔软的羊毛绒。

bilingual.source: The pillow is filled with soft feather.
bilingual.target: 这个枕头里填满了柔软的羽毛。

bilingual.source: The toy bear was made of soft velveteen.
bilingual.target: 那只玩具熊是用柔软的棉绒做的。

bilingual.source: The baby blanket is made of soft tricot.
bilingual.target: 这条婴儿毯是用柔软的针织品做的。

yingyinNormal.en: While all your soft parts decay away, your bones get saturated with mineral-rich waters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伴随着你身上柔软的部分都慢慢腐烂，你的骨骼充满富含矿物质的海水。

yingyinNormal.en: In the Southwest province of Sichuan, the soft red sandstone of the region became the foundation for one of the great ancient wonders of China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在西南部的四川省，此地柔软的红纱成了中国古老奇迹的建造基础。

yingyinNormal.en: Your lips are so soft. Do that again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的唇真软，再来一次。

yingyinNormal.en: And I've got a soft spot for Armageddon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还对《世界末日》情有独钟。

yingyinNormal.en: I remember stroking the cat, it was so soft.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也记得抚摸那只猫咪，它好柔软。

yingyinNormal.en: A very soft touch. You have my word, sir. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要非常柔和。我向您保证，总统先生。很好。

yingyinNormal.en: But you know, no enthusiasm. Just a soft opening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，不激动。这只是试营业。

yingyinNormal.en: How is the soft power exchange between these two roommates?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这两个室友之间的软实力交换情况怎样呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! This teapot is too soft. Real tea-sets aren't soft. My mummy makes real pots. She does pottery.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦。这个茶壶实在是太软了。真正的茶壶不应该是软软的。我的妈妈会做一套真的茶具。因为她很会做陶器。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? Clay. All pottery starts off like that. That is soft, like play-clay. We need it to be soft, so we can shape it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是什么东西啊。黏土。所有的陶器都是用这个做的。可是这个也是软的，就像彩泥一样。我们要用这个软软的黏土捏出形状。

yingyinNormal.en: What's the difference between a soft one and a hard one?
yingyinNormal.zh: 软和硬开张有啥区别吗？

yingyinNormal.en: It was good to see you, Remy. Don't get too soft in retirement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 见到你很高兴，雷米，别退休就变怂了。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, we both know he has a soft spot for the sexy doctor type.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都知道他就喜欢性感医生。

yingyinNormal.en: And I also want to impress upon all of you here today the importance of that soft culture, that soft power exchange, and how each of us is involved in that exchange.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天在这里，我还要向你们强调软文化，软实力，交换的重要性，以及我们每个人都逃不开这场交换。

yingyinNormal.en: We have no big expectations about the opening tonight. It's a soft opening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对今晚的开张不抱过高的期望，只是软开张啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Ohh, it's still soft. What do you think this is? Mon. I think it was a mouse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它还是软软的，你觉得它是什么呢？我想它是老鼠。

yingyinNormal.en: Allow me to do this quietly, with a soft touch. I won't antagonize them, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以低调行事，态度柔和，我不会惹怒他们的，总统先生。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, hon. Soft kitty, warm kitty... That's for when I'm sick. Sad is not sick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，亲爱……嗯，软软的猫猫， 温温的猫猫……那是我生病时候唱的，伤心不是生病。

yingyinNormal.en: And I got a soft spot for him. Plus he's got my back, if you know what I mean. Not really.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且我很同情他，而且他一直很支持我，如果你知道我什么意思的话。并不太懂。

yingyinNormal.en: It gives a bit of longevity to the loaf, keeps it nice and soft. And finally, 320 ml of water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这会让面包更持久，更漂亮，更松软，最后加入320毫升的水。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使软化；使变软；使柔和；使缓和；软化；从中除去无机盐；贬值；削弱…的抵抗

word_family.mean: adj. 易弯曲的；柔软的；柔和的；不刺眼的；心肠软的；仁慈的；富于同情心的；不够严厉的；不含酒精的；轻柔的

sense_info_list.en: not severe or forceful enough, especially in criticizing or punishing someone who has done something wrong

examination_example.sentence: greater "<highlight>soft</highlight> pressure"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更大的“软压力”

examination_example.sentence: Corporations are evading the meritocratic hiring and promotion of women to top positions — no matter how much "<highlight>soft</highlight> pressure" is put upon them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业在逃避雇用精英和提拔女性担任高层职位——无论对他们施加多大的“软压力”。

examination_example.sentence: For example, he theorised that a judge fearful of appearing too <highlight>soft</highlight> on crime might be more likely to send someone to prison.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，他推论说，一个害怕在犯罪问题上表现得过于心慈手软的法官也许更有可能把某人送进监狱。

sense_info_list.en: not forceful, loud, or easily noticed

examination_example.sentence: Beethoven's habit of increasing the volume with an extreme intensity and then abruptly following it with a <highlight>soft</highlight> passage was rarely used by composers before him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贝多芬习惯以极大的强度增加音量，然后突然以一个柔和的片段紧随其后，这在他之前的作曲家中是很少使用的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (soft skills)人际关系技能; 软技能

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使软化；使变软；使柔和；使缓和；软化；从中除去无机盐；贬值；削弱…的抵抗

word_family.mean: adj. 易弯曲的；柔软的；柔和的；不刺眼的；心肠软的；仁慈的；富于同情心的；不够严厉的；不含酒精的；轻柔的

examination_example.sentence: As the <highlight>soft</highlight> drink gained in popularity, it faced a growing number of competitors—counterfeits even trying to copy Coke's logo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着软饮料的普及，它面临着越来越多的竞争对手——假冒伪劣产品甚至试图复制可口可乐的标志。

examination_example.sentence: Few of us can fill up the tank without buying a few snacks, cigarettes, <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks or other items we can live without.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不买一些零食、香烟、软饮料或其他我们生活中不需要的东西，很少有人能把油箱加满。

examination_example.sentence: Sports drinks made up most of the food and drink deals, with <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks and fast food filling out the remainder.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常运动饮料构成了食品和饮料的大部分，软饮料和快餐填补了剩余部分。

sense_info_list.zh: (soft skills)人际关系技能; 软技能

examination_example.sentence: This study shows the importance of so-called "non-cognitive" or <highlight>soft</highlight> skills in contributing to children's positive peer relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究显示了所谓的‘非认知’或社交技能技能在促进儿童积极的同伴关系方面的重要性。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 使软化；使变软；使柔和；使缓和；软化；从中除去无机盐；贬值；削弱…的抵抗

word_family.mean: adj. 易弯曲的；柔软的；柔和的；不刺眼的；心肠软的；仁慈的；富于同情心的；不够严厉的；不含酒精的；轻柔的

examination_example.sentence: I think we should get some beer and wine, and some fruit juice, and other <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想我们应该买一些啤酒、葡萄酒、果汁和其他软饮料。

examination_example.sentence: It sells local wines and <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它出售当地的葡萄酒和软饮料。

examination_example.sentence: "It still has to go into a container." That is, in part, why smaller and <highlight>softer</highlight> containers have taken off—they fit into backpacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “它仍然需要进入一个容器。”这就是为什么更小更软的容器开始流行的部分原因——它们可以装在背包里。

examination_example.sentence: The principal aim is to create a home-like relaxing feel, so airlines tend to use <highlight>soft</highlight> colors that feel domestic for that reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其主要目的是创造一种像家一样放松的感觉，因此航空公司倾向于使用柔和的颜色，让人感觉像家一样。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (声音)轻的; 轻柔的; 悦耳的
温和的; 和蔼的; 仁厚的;  软心肠的
柔和的; 不刺眼的; 不耀眼的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 易弯曲的；柔软的；柔和的；不刺眼的；心肠软的；仁慈的；富于同情心的；不够严厉的；不含酒精的；轻柔的

examination_example.sentence: But I homed in, with uncertainty, on one particular table, full of fresh and <highlight>soft</highlight> tomatoes the size of my fist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我不确定地回到了一张桌子上，桌上摆满了拳头大小的新鲜柔软的西红柿。

examination_example.sentence: Baskets of perfect red strawberries, the red-painted sides of the coffee truck; and most of all, the tomatoes: <highlight>soft</highlight> and round red tomatoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一篮篮完美的红色草莓，涂成红色侧面的咖啡车；最重要的是西红柿：又软又圆的红色西红柿。

sense_info_list.zh: (声音)轻的; 轻柔的; 悦耳的

examination_example.sentence: Listening to just 30 minutes of <highlight>soft</highlight> music every day may help with healthy blood sugar levels, through the lowering of stress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天只听30分钟的轻音乐有助于降低压力，从而维持健康血糖水平。

examination_example.sentence: Her voice was <highlight>soft</highlight> but confident as she pointed to the corner near the windows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她指着窗户附近的角落，声音柔和而自信。

sense_info_list.zh: 温和的; 和蔼的; 仁厚的;  软心肠的

examination_example.sentence: Out comes a "<highlight>soft</highlight>-serve" creamy dessert, to be eaten right away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推出了“软服务”奶油甜点，可以立即食用。

examination_example.sentence: Beer, wine, <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks like Coke, 7-Up…you name it, I've got it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 啤酒、葡萄酒、可乐、七喜等软饮料，凡是你能想到的，我都有！

sense_info_list.zh: 柔和的; 不刺眼的; 不耀眼的

exam_freq_info.chinese: 柔和的; 仁慈的; 温柔地
(饮料)不含酒精的; (毒品)软性的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 轻声地；轻轻地；温柔地；慢慢地；柔和地

word_family.mean: adj. 易弯曲的；柔软的；柔和的；不刺眼的；心肠软的；仁慈的；富于同情心的；不够严厉的；不含酒精的；轻柔的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 轻音乐；轻柔的音乐；柔和的音乐

sense_info_list.zh: 柔和的; 仁慈的; 温柔地

examination_example.sentence: Our hometown has left many <highlight>soft</highlight> and sweet memories in our hearts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的家乡在我们心中留下了许多温馨的回忆。

examination_example.sentence: I'd never heard a more <highlight>soft</highlight>-hearted explanation as to why animal lives are so short.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于动物的寿命为何如此短暂，我从来没有听过比这更心软的解释。

examination_example.sentence: Both Anna and her brother like listening to <highlight>soft</highlight> music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安娜和她的哥哥都喜欢听轻音乐。

examination_example.sentence: The scientist also wants to make solar panels more flexible, which are as <highlight>soft</highlight> as clothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位科学家还想让太阳能电池板变得更有弹性，像衣服一样柔软。

examination_example.sentence: Today they're made of <highlight>soft</highlight> plastic and are much easier to use!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，它们由软塑料制成，更容易使用！

examination_example.sentence: In the early spring, in March, the leaves were green and <highlight>soft</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 初春三月，树叶青翠柔软。

sense_info_list.zh: (饮料)不含酒精的; (毒品)软性的

examination_example.sentence: We mainly sell food, like bread, eggs, <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks, rice, sugar, and cookies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们主要卖食品，像面包、鸡蛋、软饮料、大米、糖和饼干。

examination_example.sentence: These children were physically in better shape and drank fewer sugary <highlight>soft</highlight> drinks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些孩子身体状况更好，喝的含糖软饮料更少。

examination_example.sentence: Collect <highlight>soft</highlight> drink bottles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 收集软饮料瓶。
